Interface FlipFitGymCentreDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitGymCenterDAO
public interface FlipFitGymCentreDAOInterface
Data Access Object (DAO) interface for handling gym center-related operations in FlipFit system. This interface defines methods for viewing, adding, retrieving gym centers, managing approval requests, and fetching gym centers by specific criteria.
Author:
gamma-group

      Retrieves details of all gym centers owned by a specific owner.
      Parameters:
      gymOwnerId - ID of the gym owner
      Returns:
      List of gym centers owned by the specified owner

      Retrieves details of a gym center based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      gymCentreId - ID of the gym center
      Returns:
      The FlipFitGymCenter object

    • addGymCentre

      void addGymCentre(FlipFitGymCenter centre)
      Adds a new gym center to the system.
      Parameters:
      centre - The FlipFitGymCenter object representing the gym center to add

    • getPendingGymCentreList

      List<FlipFitGymCenter> getPendingGymCentreList()
      Retrieves a list of pending gym centers awaiting approval.
      Returns:
      List of pending gym centers

    • validateGymCentre

      void validateGymCentre(String gymCentreId, boolean isApproved)
      Validates (approves or rejects) a gym center based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      gymCentreId - ID of the gym center to validate
      isApproved - True to approve, false to reject

    • sendCentreApprovalRequest

      void sendCentreApprovalRequest(String gymCentreId)
      Sends a request for approval of a gym center based on its ID.
      Parameters:
      gymCentreId - ID of the gym center to request approval for

      Retrieves a list of gym centers located in a specific city.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      List of gym centers in the specified city
